about_the_game:
Get these exclusive items to help uncover the mysteries that lie in the journey of Bless Unleashed

*The contents of the purchased DLC will be properly given after close and reconnecting to the game.

The [New Frontier Pack] includes:

  • 2,000 (+300) Lumena
    Currency is used to purchase items and services available within the Lumena Shop. A variety of items such as cosmetics and services are offered in the Lumena Shop.

  • Card: Radiant Finery Headwear (Epic)
    [This costume can only be used as Signature item for costume fusion]
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Card: Radiant Finery Outfit (Epic)
    [This costume can only be used as Signature item for costume fusion]
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Card: Sweet Blush Sheep Plush (Epic Mount)
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • New Frontier Pack Exclusive Title : [Pioneer]
    Acquire the title [Pioneer]. The title is visible above the character's name.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • 300,000 Gold

  • Bag Expansion Ticket ×5
    Increases your bag's maximum capacity by 1. To collect various items and materials, expanding the bag's inventory is a must.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Premium Benefits (90 Days)
    [Premium Benefits]
    Gain +50 Lumena Every Day

    Open the VIP hatch slot

    Free to switch blesses
    Increases the capacity of your bag +80
    Increases PvE XP Gain +100%
    Increases PvE Gold Gain +25%
    Increases Quest SXP Gain +25%
    Increases HP Recovery at Soul Pyres +300%
    Reduces Gathering/Mining/Logging Time -100%
    Increases All Crafting XP Gain +25%
    5% Marketplace Fee Discount
    40% General Goods Merchant Recovery Potion Purchase Price Discount

    - Daily Lumena can be received through daily login and added directly to the Lumena balance.
    - Daily Lumena from Premium Benefits refreshes at 00:00 UTC.
    - Premium Benefit's effects and durations are updated/applied when logging back to the game server or visiting the Lumena Shop.

  • Daily Lumena Booster (30 Days)
    Instantly receive 500 Lumena and receive daily 100 Lumena for daily logins.

    - Daily Lumena are added directly to the Lumena balance.
    - Daily Lumena refreshes at 00:00 UTC.
    - Daily Lumena's effects and durations are updated/applied when logging back to the game server or visiting the Lumena Shop.

    • Steam's refund policy applies to purchases made with Steam Wallet.

    • Purchased products can be collected through the Premium Inventory available in the Lumena Shop or Character Inventory
      (Premium Benefits effects are applied immediately when connected to the game.)

    • The actual product may vary from the product image shown.

    • Please contact customer support for inquiries regarding product purchases.
detailed_description:
Get these exclusive items to help uncover the mysteries that lie in the journey of Bless Unleashed

*The contents of the purchased DLC will be properly given after close and reconnecting to the game.

The [New Frontier Pack] includes:

  • 2,000 (+300) Lumena
    Currency is used to purchase items and services available within the Lumena Shop. A variety of items such as cosmetics and services are offered in the Lumena Shop.

  • Card: Radiant Finery Headwear (Epic)
    [This costume can only be used as Signature item for costume fusion]
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Card: Radiant Finery Outfit (Epic)
    [This costume can only be used as Signature item for costume fusion]
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Card: Sweet Blush Sheep Plush (Epic Mount)
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • New Frontier Pack Exclusive Title : [Pioneer]
    Acquire the title [Pioneer]. The title is visible above the character's name.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • 300,000 Gold

  • Bag Expansion Ticket ×5
    Increases your bag's maximum capacity by 1. To collect various items and materials, expanding the bag's inventory is a must.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Premium Benefits (90 Days)
    [Premium Benefits]
    Gain +50 Lumena Every Day

    Open the VIP hatch slot

    Free to switch blesses
    Increases the capacity of your bag +80

    Increases PvE Gold Gain +25%
    Increases Quest SXP Gain +25%
    Increases HP Recovery at Soul Pyres +300%
    Reduces Gathering/Mining/Logging Time -100%
    Increases All Crafting XP Gain +25%
    5% Marketplace Fee Discount
    40% General Goods Merchant Recovery Potion Purchase Price Discount

    - Daily Lumena can be received through daily login and added directly to the Lumena balance.
    - Daily Lumena from Premium Benefits refreshes at 00:00 UTC.
    - Premium Benefit's effects and durations are updated/applied when logging back to the game server or visiting the Lumena Shop.

  • Daily Lumena Booster (30 Days)
    Instantly receive 500 Lumena and receive daily 100 Lumena for daily logins.

    - Daily Lumena are added directly to the Lumena balance.
    - Daily Lumena refreshes at 00:00 UTC.

    • Steam's refund policy applies to purchases made with Steam Wallet.

    • The actual product may vary from the product image shown.

    • Please contact customer support for inquiries regarding product purchases.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
